article_title: Gazans crowdfund thousands for uncertain escape
sentence: Her  own  relatives  in  Gaza  were  killed  in  October,  she  says.

sentence: Earlier  that  day,  on  12  February,  he  sent  the  BBC  a  picture  of  two  girls  who  he  said  died  overnight  in  a  nearby  air  strike.
